isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - VALVE COVER AND/OR GASKET, REPLACE (LEFT SIDE)

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: VALVE COVER AND/OR GASKET, REPLACE (LEFT SIDE)
wtsproc.config: Left to right side viewed as sitting in driver's seat looking forward.

step1.para: Chock wheels.
Disconnect battery.
Disconnect serpentine belt.
Disconnect wiring from alternator.
Disconnect wiring from map sensor and sensor hose from bulkhead.
Remove alternator.
Remove fuel line and heater hose support bracket from valve cover.
Remove bolts retaining valve cover. Remove valve cover.
Disconnect wiring from valve cover gasket. Remove gasket
Clean valve cover and matting surfaces.
Install valve cover gasket. Connect wiring to gasket.
Install valve cover. Torque bolts to spec.
Install fuel line and heater hose support bracket to valve cover.
Install alternator.
Connect map sensor hose to bulkhead. Connect wiring to map sensor.
Connect wiring to alternator.
Connect serpentine belt.
Connect battery.
Check engine oil level and add as needed.
Start engine and check for leaks.
Remove wheel chocks.
